scripts.pack:prebuilt: tar zcf a2sui.tar.gz build/kremlin/index.html build/kremlin/include.js build/kremlin/bundle.js build/kremlin/*.css
scripts.dist: npm run build:prod && npm run pack:prebuilt
scripts.download: rm -f a2sui.tar.gz && wget https://adder2snake.vercel.app/a2sui.tar.gz && tar xf a2sui.tar.gz
